summary: This is the story of a modern day pirate mad man and his crew of 8, searching for fortune on a cruise ship but a small group of passengers fight back.
cast: Dylan Walsh|Ice-T|Erika Eleniak|Claudia Christian|Rick Ducommun|Heidi Schanz|John Koyama|Jonathan Fuller|Stephen Macht|Michael Bailey Smith|Thom Adcox-Hernandez|Beau Billingslea|Chick Vennera|Scott L. Schwartz|Terry Moore|Jesus Nebot|William Langlois|Lenny Juliano|Marc Vahanian|Tyler Bearde|Philip Lehl|Kristine Mejia|Ernest Hardin Jr.|Ron Roggé|Tony Colitti|Steve J. Hennessy|John Cade|Warren A. Stevens|Barry James|William Kuehn|Shannon Marie Codner|Robert Donavan|Nikki Fritz|Richard Gabai|Rocco Salata|Kim Sill
title: Pánico en alta mar
